Reviews.Title: “The internet page is a trick! They are lying!!”
Reviews.Author: KillerWizard
Reviews.Content: reservation seeing internet home page hotel nice elegant lists services huge disappointment enter thats empty space isnt decoration prison cells arent lamps read sleep bring light tvs dont remote control ugly internet description fast internet connection iron coffee maker dryer lies personnel front desk rude tend pass hot potato tired complaint food terrible restaurant tomorrow ill look hotel maybe marriot hilton return dont hotel
